author: dougm
msg: this $SIG{CHLD} / $? status checking stuff does not work well on
solaris or hpux.  more often than not get:
server has died with status 255 (please examine t/logs/error_log)
and yet the server has started just fine, can run t/TEST -run and all
disabling this until somebody can make the code work properly on all

author: aaron
msg: Pass the --includedir flag to the apr and apr-util configure calls.

author: aaron
msg: Allow us to override the default --libdir from the config.layout
if it was specified to configure.
